#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int n;
    cin >>n;
    while(n--)
    {
        string s;
        cin>>s;long long int count=0;
        long long int l=s.length();
        for(long long int i=0;i<l-1;i++) if(s[i] == s[i+1]) count++;
        cout <<count<<endl;
    }// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
